title: How to make $500 starting from $100 - Quora

response.answer_text: You have very realistic goals... $100 is enough to start an online businness. It is not so hard to get the results that you desire.(You should be patient though and stay away from mget-rich-quick schemes) The best way I can advice you to take is affiliate marketing. You will need a website, hosting and some sort of training. Here is the budget that I Can give you for the first month only:> $19 for affiliate marketing training: Hand picked hot red hot keywords, hosting for your site, Access to the keyword tool and rubbing shoulders with succesful marketers.> $10 for a domain a domain name. This caters for ther whole year. You will only be coming up with content and promote affiliate products that you believe in. Here are the links...onlinedesignersincome.com/domains(Buying a cheap domain -$10)onlinedesignersincome.com/premium(Only $19)

I like Thomas's answer...you need to provide a service to get that type of return off of $100. You don't need a talent necessarily - if you read one in-depth article on say Facebook ads - you are probably ahead of 95% of people out there on the topic. You can then turnaround and search for people that would benefit from running Facebook ads and pitch them on your services. Another example, lets say its a local business that doesn't have placement on Google search...you could offer to setup their listing, optimize it for views on search and do all their SEO work. Point is -- find a problem people have (or don't know they have yet), take a solution to them and get paid.
